alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 19 at 3:07PM PST until December 21 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 20 inches, with the highest totals in the high elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Periods of snowfall rates over 1 inch per hour possible. * WHERE...Stehekin, Leavenworth, Holden Village, Plain, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the commute Tuesday morning and evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Western Chelan County
